arts.sum: Ian Wilkerson has provided a score prediction for all eight matches taking place in LaLiga on Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday.

arts.ttl: Official: Celta Vigo announce signing of Jones El-Abdellaoui
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Celta Vigo have this week announced some up-and-coming reinforcements to the club’s attacking ranks. This comes amid confirmation of the signing of Jones El-Abdellaoui. El-Abdellaoui, for his…
